scripts.docs:build: node commentCreateAttribute.js && node handleDirectory.js && node copyReadme.js && node handleExport.js && vitepress build docs
scripts.doc: node commentCreateAttribute.js && node handleDirectory.js && node handleExport.js && vitepress dev docs
scripts.publicPublish: node publish.js public updateVersion && cd ./publishDir && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.privatePublish: node publish.js private && cd ./publishDir && npm publish --registry=http://10.10.120.191:8081/repository/npm-private/
scripts.publish: npm run publicPublish && npm run privatePublish
